availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen B. Reese (Mason County, Kentucky, cooper)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, cooper. Maryland native. Married to Elizabeth Ann Dredden Reese in Mason County, Kentucky, in January 1831. Father of Isaac Reese. Engaged in manufacture and trade occupation in Mason County in 1840. Cooper in Mason County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Northern Division, p. 5
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 138.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #26810.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000281842.
